strategy_reasoning: Using the 'cozy pixel art' aesthetic allows us to turn technical updates (API tables, server moves, bug fixes) into a narrative about digital gardening and exploration. The VisionAI feature is visualized as a character gaining sight, while the Sweden server move becomes a cute travel moment. This aligns perfectly with the Stardew Valley/Unpacking vibe requested.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art close-up. A cute tiny robot character with a CRT monitor head holding a pixelated polaroid photo. A glowing pixel eye icon floats above it. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Text in pixel font: 'I CAN SEE!'. Wholesome, nostalgic, Stardew Valley vibes.
images.description: Announcing VisionAI - the AI can now 'see' images in chat.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art landscape. A tiny cute server box character wearing a cozy winter scarf and knit hat, standing in a minimalist snowy pixel field (Sweden). Soft pastel blue and lime green (#ecf874) aurora sky. Chunky pixels, serene vibes like A Short Hike. Text in pixel font: 'GPT-5.2 moved to Sweden'. Warm and inviting.
images.description: Visualizing the GPT-5.2 endpoint move to Sweden Central.

images.prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art interior scene. A tidy retro workspace with a CRT computer. On screen: a clean, compact inventory list (representing API keys). A tiny pixel bee is sweeping away 'glitch' dust bunnies. Warm sunset lighting through the window. Unpacking game aesthetic. Soft pastels and lime green (#ecf874). Organized and calm.
images.description: Representing the UI cleanup for API keys and bug fixes.

caption:
New eyes, new travels, and a tidy workspace! üå∏‚ú®

Updates from the digital garden:

üëÅÔ∏è **VisionAI is here:** Our chat models just got a major upgrade‚Äîthey can now see! Send images and let the AI analyze them. 

üá∏üá™ **Hej Sweden:** We moved our GPT-5.2 endpoint to Sweden Central. Better vibes, no content blocks on the 'openai-large' model. 

üßπ **Spring Cleaning:** We tidied up the API keys table (no more weird scrolling!) and squashed some bugs in the tier workflows. 

Everything is looking cozy and pixel-perfect. Try it out! 

Link in bio to build üåø

alt_text: Series of cozy 8-bit pixel art images. 1: A cute robot holding a photo with text 'I CAN SEE!'. 2: A pixel server wearing a scarf in a snowy landscape. 3: A tidy retro workspace with a pixel bee cleaning up.
